sprites

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprites.Sprite
      • sprites.Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends Sprite
    This represents an enemy that hurts the character on contact.
    Version:
    5/6/22

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class sprites.Sprite

        FACE_LEFT, FACE_RIGHT, NOTAPPLICABLE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enemy(double x, double y, int faceDir)
      This creates an enemy at a specified place in the coordinate grid and places it facing a certain direction.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(double x,
             double y,
             int faceDir)
        This creates an enemy at a specified place in the coordinate grid and places it facing a certain direction.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the enemy
        y - the y-coordinate of the enemy
        faceDir - the initial direction the enemy faces when spawned
